page.title: 02TELEPHONES AND POST BOXES
page.content: Telephones and Post Boxes All the telephone Kiosks of Bulls Cross still have circular dials,unlike the modern push button types or the even more modern pay-card phones where you insert a card instead of money,the cost being automatically charged to your bank. All post boxes date from Queen Elizabeth 2nd's time except the box opposite Forty Hall which dates from Queen Victoria's reign.most post boxes are emptied at 8.00 a.m. noon and 5.00 p.m. Postage stamps,licences,pensions,allowances and similar items are obtainable from counters in certian local shops or the main Post Offices in Enfield.
